landing.title: Experienced Developer Available for Hire May 2022
landing.summary: 4 years of work experience, award-winning side projects, skilled in system design, expert in Rust.

skills.title: Backend Development
skills.summary: REST and gRPC services in Java/Spring and NodeJS. PostgreSQL and Redis databases. Continuous delivery with Kubernetes.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.summary: React apps with hooks/Redux-based state management. JavaScript and Typescript. Responsive websites using HTML/CSS.

skills.title: Systems Programming
skills.summary: Rust and its async runtimes. Non-blocking IO with io_uring. Foreign function interface. Performant data structures and algorithms.

skills.title: Software Architecture
skills.summary: Relational and NoSQL modelling. Queue-based systems and microservices. CQRS and event sourcing. Domain-driven design.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.summary: Dart/Flutter mobile apps for iOS/Android. Stream-based BLoC state management. Deep link navigation. Firebase backend.

skills.title: Full Product Cycle
skills.summary: Acquiring customers, gathering requirements, managing expectations, timely execution, long-term maintenance.
